page.title: 02A day in the life of.....
page.content: Every morning I get up about 7 o'clock and have a game on my Amstrad computer. When I have finished getting changed, my mother cooks my breakfast. When it is twenty to nine, I go to school. We have French or reading, then maths. We have English after play and dinner at 12.30. In the afternoon we do art and craft. I like school but I like it better when I return home I soon go out and play football. When we have finished I go to the shops and buy a drink. Then I go home, watch television, go upstairs and listen to Duran Duran. Then I have tea and go out again. I come inside at 8.30 watch television to 9.00, then go to bed, when I just remember to learn my spellings. Then I fall asleep.
